attributes.action: To stop politicians trying to elect a temporary M.P to replace Our Primeminister
attributes.additional_details: The Primeminister, and his ministers, have injected a vibrant ,positive assertiveness creating an air of expectancy. Travelling throughout the U.K, working  tirelessly in the campaign to gain the trust of the electorate and media. Delivering  a surge of much awaited, and needed, monetary packages that have sadly been neglected  since the referendum to leave the E.U. in 2016. The last 25 days have brought negativity from Parliament, the likes of which has never been seen before in our lifetime .
attributes.background: Our Primeminister, Mr Boris Johnson, has been in post now for 3 weeks, 3 days. He was elected by the Conservative Membership to become Leader  of Her Majesty's Government, as such, he became our country's Primeminister. His mandate to leave the E.U on 31 October 2019, with or without a deal.
